item.title: Turning the iPhone into a Laboratory Microscope with AI and BLE
item.description:
I recently shared an exciting project where we transformed an iPhone into a fully functional laboratory microscope by combining hardware innovation with AI, if you’re working on similar hardware + AI/BLE projects or interested in the technical details, check out the complete write-up on HackerNoon:

How We Turned the iPhone into a Laboratory Microscope with AI and BLE
